name: Lifetris
description:
Life is a big Tetris, every decision has a cost!

Our LudumDare 44 game entry.
1 or 2 players,
Made in Poland and Quebec thru Discord in around 22 hours total.

---------------------------------
Controls:
---------------------------------
Player1

Move Left               - Left arrow
Move Right              - Right arrow
Drop                    - Down arrow
Rotate Clockwise        - Right Control/Right Option
Rotate CounterClockwise - Right Shift/Right Command

... or gamepad #1

Player2

Move Left               - A
Move Right              - D
Drop                    - S
Rotate Clockwise        - E
Rotate CounterClockwise - Q

... or gamepad #2

---------------------------------
Scoring:
---------------------------------
Landing a tetromino: 1 pt
Clearing a line: 10 pts
Reaching the top of the screen: -50 pts
